channel.title: Conference on NTU IoT Research Group
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on NTU IoT Research Group

item.title: e-Energy 2023
item.description: ACM e-Energy'23 held at Orlando has been successfully concluded, where Prof. Rui Tan served as a TPC Co-Chair. Link to album

item.title: CPS-IoT 2023
item.description: Group members Jiale Chen, Wenjie Luo, and Yimin Dai presented their works at CPS-IoT Week 2023.

item.title: ICCPS 2023 Best Paper
item.description: Group member Jiale Chen’s work, “BubCam”, won best paper award at The 14th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Cyber-Physical System. Congratulations!

item.title: SenSys 2022
item.description: Linshan and alumni Qun and Zhenyu presented their works on SenSys'22, Boston.

item.title: SenSys'22
item.description: Linshan’s work PriMask is selected as SenSys'22 Best Paper Candidate. Congratulations!

item.title: e-Energy 2021 - SECON 2021
item.description: Qun, Siyuan, and Joy presented their papers at e-Energy'21 and SECON'21

item.title: IPSN 2021
item.description: Wenjie has presented our paper “PhyAug: Physics-Directed Data Augmentation for Deep Sensing Model Transfer in Cyber-Physical Systems” on the ACM/IEEE IPSN 2021, part of CPS Week 2021. The paper has also be selected as the Best Artifact Award Runner-up. Congratulations!

item.title: IEEE PES Day 2021
item.description: Rui gave a talk titled “Experiences and Learned Lessons from an Air Free-Cooled Tropical Data Center Testbed (Dec 2017 – Dec 2019)” on IEEE PES Day 2021.

item.title: IPSN TPC 2020
item.description: IPSN TPC meeting , Washington University in St. Louis, Jan 2020.

item.title: Embedded AI Submit 2019
item.description: Embedded AI Submit 2019 at Shenzhen, Dec 2019

item.title: SenSys 2019
item.description: Qun’s paper presentation “Moving Target Defense for Embedded Deep Visual Sensing against Adversarial Examples” at SenSys, New York, Nov 2019.

item.title: AIChallengeIoT 2019
item.description: Paper presentation “Challenges of Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning in IoT”, at AIChallengeIoT'19, New York, Nov 2019.

item.title: MobiCom 2019
item.description: Zhenyu’s paper presentation at ACM MobiCom, Oct 2019 MobiCom 25th Anniversary, on a beach of Los Cabos, Oct 2019 MobiCom 2019 limited edition!

item.title: IoTDI 2019
item.description: Linshan’s paper presentation “On Lightweight Privacy-Preserving Collaborative Learning for Internet-of-Things Objects” at IoTDI, Montreal, Apr 2019.

item.title: EWSN 2019
item.description: Keynote “Cyber-Physical Approach to Resilient City-Scale IoT Systems”, The 1st workshop on Low Power Wide Area Networks for Internet of Things, EWSN'19, Tsinghua University, Feb 2019.

item.title: Ubicomp 2018
item.description: Qun’s paper presentation at UbiComp, Singapore, Oct, 2018
